title: Chris Vernon & Ben Cohen
description:
Zach talks to Chris Vernon of the Ringer about the Memphis Grizzlies and the wild West playoff race, then Ben Cohen of the Wall Street Journal discusses his book about the hot hand and Stephen Curry.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
